a.n: Tigran Hamasyan & Mathias Eick - November Music

p.k: In 2019, Armenian pianist Tigran Hamasyan and Norwegian trumpeter Mathias Eick played a duo performance at November Music in 's-Hertogenbosch, the Netherlands.
p.d: November Music, a Dutch music festival in 's-Hertogenbosch, showcases today's prominent composers. It programs top-notch ensembles, jazz and world music pioneers, interdisciplinary concerts, and sound art. In 2019, Tigran Hamasyan and Mathias Eick played a duo performance here. Armenian pianist Hamasyan has claimed a category of his own in contemporary jazz. Norwegian trumpeter Mathias Eick is an undisputed master of his instrument.
